channel.title: Comments on: Dr. Waldron and the Worship of God Conference

item.title: By: The Family that Worships Together [5-Part Video Series] feat. Scott Brown, Conrad Mbewe, Jeff Pollard & More | The Confessing Baptist
item.dc:creator: The Family that Worships Together [5-Part Video Series] feat. Scott Brown, Conrad Mbewe, Jeff Pollard & More | The Confessing Baptist
item.description: [...] Waldron, at the Midwest Center for Theological Studies blog, explains his speaking engagement at the upcoming National Center for Family-Integrated Churches [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Waldron, at the Midwest Center for Theological Studies blog, explains his speaking engagement at the upcoming National Center for Family-Integrated Churches […]

item.title: By: Daniel Carmichael
item.dc:creator: Daniel Carmichael
item.description:
I am so glad to hear that you will be at that event! I am part of a church that happens to be Family Integrated but more importantly doctrinally sound and holding to the 1689 Confession.
Praise God for all your work and ministry!
item.content:encoded:
I am so glad to hear that you will be at that event! I am part of a church that happens to be Family Integrated but more importantly doctrinally sound and holding to the 1689 Confession.

Praise God for all your work and ministry!
